ranking.reasons: Comprehensive bundle with structured logging, glue adapters, proper IAM scoping, complete CI/CD, and integration tests; minor deductions for slightly verbose structure.
Solid baseline bundle with all required components, proper IAM policies, and CI/CD; lacks structured logging layer and integration tests present in B.
Well-organized with separate IAM policy files and contract tests; minimal glue adapters lack error handling; multiple archive_file resources may cause packaging issues.

notes: All three candidates meet core requirements. B_prompt edges ahead with superior observability (structured JSON logging), better error handling in glue adapters, and integration tests. A_prompt provides a clean, functional baseline. C_prompt's separate policy files aid maintainability but thin glue wrappers and potential packaging conflicts lower deployability confidence.
